mdRecord.dcterms:title: Nnamdi Azikiwe, New York, NY
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Carlyle Studios, Inc., 28 West 57th Street, New York, N.Y.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Nnamdi Azikiwe from Nigeria, attend Storer College in Harpers Ferry, W. Va., 1926-1928. He subsequently became the first president of the Federal Republic of Nigeria.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: College students
